content: आयोगः {@--1@} Appointment, en trusting one with something. {@--2@} Action, performance of an act. {@--3@} Offering flowers, perfumes &c. {@--4@} A shore or bank; a quay to which boats are attached. {@--5@} Connection, union; स देशो भ्रमरायोगः प्रदीप इव लक्ष्यते <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--6@} Obstruction (रोध).
